sqlMap.select:
SELECT ID ,POS_DEV_ID ,FILE_CODE ,SEC_MAIN_KEY ,MAIN_KEY ,DATE ,TIME ,MACHINE_NO ,BK_TERM_ID ,BK_MER_ID ,BATCH_ID ,PIN_KEY ,PACK_KEY ,MAC_KEY ,CREATE_DATE ,CREATE_TIME ,EXT ,EXT1 ,POS_ID FROM yunrich_terminal WHERE 1=1 AND yunrich_terminal.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(POS_DEV_ID) Like '%'||(#pos_dev_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FILE_CODE) Like '%'||(#file_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SEC_MAIN_KEY) Like '%'||(#sec_main_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MAIN_KEY) Like '%'||(#main_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DATE) Like '%'||(#date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TIME) Like '%'||(#time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MACHINE_NO) Like '%'||(#machine_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BK_TERM_ID) Like '%'||(#bk_term_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BK_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#bk_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BATCH_ID) Like '%'||(#batch_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PIN_KEY) Like '%'||(#pin_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PACK_KEY) Like '%'||(#pack_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MAC_KEY) Like '%'||(#mac_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_DATE) Like '%'||(#create_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(EXT) Like '%'||(#ext:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(EXT1) Like '%'||(#ext1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(POS_ID) Like '%'||(#pos_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM yunrich_terminal WHERE 1=1 AND yunrich_terminal.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(POS_DEV_ID) Like '%'||(#pos_dev_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FILE_CODE) Like '%'||(#file_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SEC_MAIN_KEY) Like '%'||(#sec_main_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MAIN_KEY) Like '%'||(#main_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(DATE) Like '%'||(#date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TIME) Like '%'||(#time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MACHINE_NO) Like '%'||(#machine_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BK_TERM_ID) Like '%'||(#bk_term_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BK_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#bk_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BATCH_ID) Like '%'||(#batch_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PIN_KEY) Like '%'||(#pin_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PACK_KEY) Like '%'||(#pack_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MAC_KEY) Like '%'||(#mac_key:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_DATE) Like '%'||(#create_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(EXT) Like '%'||(#ext:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(EXT1) Like '%'||(#ext1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(POS_ID) Like '%'||(#pos_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
